mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO as memNo, MEM_PWD as memPwd, MEM_POSITION as memPosition, DEPT_CODE as deptCode, MEM_NAME as memName, MEM_BIRTH as memBirth, MEM_GENDER as memGender, MEM_ADDRESS as memAddress, MEM_PHONE as memPhone, MEM_TELL as memTell, MEM_EMAIL as memEmail, MEM_PROFILE as memProfile, MEM_HOLIDAY_COUNT as memHolidayCount, MEM_JOIN_DATE as memJoinDate, MEM_RESIGN_YN as memResignYN, MEM_RESIGN_DATE as memResigndate, MEM_DEL_YN as memDelYN, MEM_DEL_DATE as memDelDate, MEM_RIGHT_CODE as memRightCode FROM member WHERE MEM_NO=#{memNo} and MEM_PWD=#{memPwd}
